ComicInfo.Series: DCeased: War of the Undead Gods
ComicInfo.Summary: The zombie-virus infected New Gods led by Darkseid attack Korugar and the Sinestro Corps, Kyle Rayner, and Soranik Natu attempt to defend the planet. Meanwhile on Earth-2, Brainiac pleads with the heroes to team up with him to stop the undead gods to save the universe.
